entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023
